product.title: SAMSUNG 15.6” Galaxy Book5 360 Copilot+ PD, AI Laptop Computer, FHD AMOLED Touchscreen, 16GB / 512GB, Dolby Atmos Quad Speakers, All-Day Battery Life, NP750QHA-KA1US, Gray

protection_plans.title: Complete Protect: One plan covers all eligible past and future purchases (Renews Monthly Until Cancelled)

product.categories_flat: Electronics > Computers & Accessories > Computers & Tablets > Laptops > Traditional Laptops
product.description:
The latest Galaxy Books supercharged with AI are here! Powered by the latest Intel Core Ultra processor, featuring upgraded graphics and an advanced NPU capable of up to 47 TOPS, these Galaxy Books will help you blaze through your workloads and unlock increased productivity. Enjoy vivid visuals and dazzling views at your fingertips with the captivating HD AMOLED display with touchscreen that makes every experience super smooth. And with Phone Link, your smartphone and PC are seamlessly connected - you can view notifications, make phone calls, view images, use mobile apps, and more - right from your PC.



¹Requires internet connection and Samsung Account login. Results may vary by uniqueness, clarity and framing of circled image and related factors. ²Requires internet connection. Optimized for English text prompts. ³Requires internet connection. Currently supports translation for video and audio subtitles into English from 40+ languages. ⁴Requires Galaxy S22 Series, Flip4 or Fold4 and later with One UI 6.1 and above. Must be logged in to the same Windows and Samsung account on both devices and have a Bluetooth and Wi-Fi connection. Requires initial setup on both smartphone (in Link to Windows app) and Galaxy Book (in Phone Link app). Some mobile apps may have security features that prevent the mobile app from being viewed on PC. ⁵Compatible only with Tab S Series. Both devices must Wi-Fi network activated. ⁶Quick Share between Galaxy devices available with the following OS: smartphones and tablets with Android OS version 10.0 (Q) and One UI 2.1 or above. PC’s running Windows 10 or later. Requires Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connection.

videos.title: This Samsung Galaxy Book5 360 Pro is One Beautiful Laptop!
The display of my Galaxy Book5 Pro 360 is out of this world!
When I unboxed my Samsung Galaxy Book5 Pro 360! !

videos_additional.title: This Samsung Galaxy Book5 360 Pro is One Beautiful Laptop!
The display of my Galaxy Book5 Pro 360 is out of this world!
When I unboxed my Samsung Galaxy Book5 Pro 360! !

feature_bullets: THE LATEST INTEL PROCESSOR DRIVING THIS NEXT-GEN AI PC: Experience a new level of transformative performance on Galaxy Book5 360 with the super fast Intel Core Ultra processor (Series 2), upgraded graphics and an advanced NPU capable of up to 47 TOPS.

GET SEARCH RESULTS IN A SNAP: AI Select lets you search right on your PC screen. No need to type — simply trace an image, a text message or even a QR code on the screen using cursor or finger and get search results on the fly.¹

REMASTER YOUR PHOTOS WITH AI: Retouch images and clean up blurry photos in Samsung Gallery with Photo Remaster. This helpful tool uses a smart algorithm that gives all-new life to your pics and makes every detail shine — just like magic.

FROM FIRST DRAFT TO FINE ART: Need a custom image for a presentation? Use Cocreator in Paint to sketch your idea and watch as AI transforms into artwork. ² Edit, regenerate and apply finishing touches using simple prompts.

GO GLOBAL WITH REAL-TIME TRANSLATIONS: Catch every word in conference calls with Live Captions. ³ AI automatically detects speech in meetings and video streams and converts it into English captions in real time so you can easily follow along.

AI ASSISTANCE IS ONE PRESS AWAY: A single press is all it takes to launch Copilot - the dedicated key on the keyboard of Galaxy Book5 360 puts personalized AI assistance at your fingertips for instant access when you need it.

VIVID VISUALS AND DAZZLING VIEWS AT YOUR FINGERTIPS: Dive into the cinematic visuals of the 15.6" Full HD AMOLED display. Rich, vivid colors and the fast response time turn working, games and streams into an edge-of-your-seat spectacle.

ACCESS YOUR MOBILE WORLD ON PC: Sync your smartphone via Phone Link to access calls, texts, images, mobile apps right from your PC. Plus, use AI features from your Galaxy phone to unlock more productivity on a big screen of Galaxy Book5 360.⁴

ADD YOUR TAB AS A SECOND SCREEN: Double your workspace by connecting Galaxy Tab as an additional display to your PC. ⁵ Link the devices with just a click, then take advantage of the extra space on Galaxy Tab with Extension, Duplicate and Rotation modes.

SWIFT, SAFE TRANSFERS WITH QUICK SHARE: Sharing image, videos, documents and large files between your Galaxy Book and other Galaxy devices is a breeze with Quick Share. ⁶ Plus, the private sharing feature encrypts your data with blockchain technology for your safekeeping.

top_reviews.title: Samsung hit this one out of the park!
top_reviews.body: This is by far the best laptop I have used. The display is better than the OLEDs I have used from HP for example. I am coming from an HP Spectre 360 which is no slouch, but I am blown away. Read more
top_reviews.body_html:

date.raw: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2025

top_reviews.title: Runs too hot, overheats, drains battery
top_reviews.body: I love using this laptop, I LOVE being able to draw on it. It is responsive and pretty easy to use. That said, she overheats SO quickly, so hot, to the point she starts working sluggishly and programs go into [NOT RESPONDING] mode once she gets too hot. The lightweight size of this laptop makes her so easy to carry around school and work, but sometimes she gets unusably hot and then the battery drain becomes egregious. Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
I love using this laptop, I LOVE being able to draw on it. It is responsive and pretty easy to use. That said, she overheats SO quickly, so hot, to the point she starts working sluggishly and programs go into [NOT RESPONDING] mode once she gets too hot. The lightweight size of this laptop makes her so easy to carry around school and work, but sometimes she gets unusably hot and then the battery drain becomes egregious.
